content:
Sure, here are two options for Facebook posts about women's month and travel:

1. Ladies, it's time to break out of the routine and treat yourself to a getaway! Whether you're traveling solo, with friends, or with your furry BFF, PetFriendly has got you covered with thousands of listings that welcome your furry companion with open arms. Get out there and make some memories! #WomensMonth #TravelMore #PetFriendly
2. Why should the guys have all the fun? Ladies, it's time to pack your bags and hit the road with your best furry friend by your side! With PetFriendly, you can find thousands of listings that welcome pets, so you don't have to leave anyone behind. It's time to make those travel dreams a reality! #WomenDeserveToTravelToo #PetFriendly #TravelGoals
